name: Sproutly Inc.
desc: Sproutly is a regenerative impact game that connects everyday digital actions to real-world tree planting and CO₂ removal. Players care for virtual trees inside the game, and these actions are directly linked to verified agroforestry projects on the ground. Sproutly’s purpose is to make climate-positive behavior accessible and engaging, while transparently funding long-term tree growth and measurable carbon removal. The app bridges play and impact by turning attention, time, and community participation into tangible environmental outcomes.

name: Stella Pay
desc: Unlock everyday purchases backed by your VeChain assets.

name: Eat Up
desc: Eat Up is an environmental initiative that utilizes a photo-based check-in mechanism to reduce food waste. Data indicates that reducing 1kg of food waste can decrease approximately 2.5kg of carbon dioxide emissions. This dapp is designed for users to photograph and upload their empty plates after meals. And after the upload is verified by AI, users receive certain B3TR incentives. The reward distribution rules are further integrated with progression-based game-like mechanics, thereby enhancing the user check-in experience and promoting sustained participation in the campaign.

name: Mino Mob
desc: Welcome to Mino Mob — a lore-based NFT collection forged on VeChain. Follow the rise of the Minos, a futuristic Minotaur race drawn into a brutal war against the Elders. Unlock exclusive lore, claim digital collectibles, and take your place in deciding the fate of Olympus.

name: VaiyansWorld
desc: Show your warrior within, the srtength, the pride, the true Vaiyan way, bringing DeFi & NFTs To the next LVL

name: SQUAD VeChain
desc: Join the $SQUAD Today, Bringing DeFi, NFTs & Gamification Closer to each other!

name: 3arningHub
desc: Turn your everyday sustainable actions into real rewards while powering the growth of the X2Earn apps ecosystem.

name: Soapy World
desc: Soapy World gamifies sustainable dishwashing by rewarding verified eco actions on-chain. Users upload before, during, and after proof photos from manual or machine washing to earn B3TR tokens and promote daily awareness toward real sustainability.

name: WoV Marketplace
desc: The first gas-free, green NFT platform built on the VeChain blockchain

name: VeSea Marketplace
desc: A peer-to-peer marketplace for NFTs, rare digital items and crypto collectibles on the VeChain blockchain.
